column1: Smoque BBQ////He got the chopped brisket sandwich. We both agreed the pulled pork was superior. That's not say it wasn't good
column2: it's just the pulled pork was amazing. He got the slaw and fries. Slaw was
column3: well slaw. Nothing to write home about
column4: it just existed. The fries were way over-seasoned but seemed to be made on site so I'll forgive them their heavy hand.
